title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site issues news releases and uses social media to keep you informed. These resources can be used before, during and after a trip to Carl Sandburg Home NHS to provide historical information about the site and current information about park facilities and events         Carl Sandburg Home NHS uses Facebook to continue the conversation with our visitors. On our page you can view images, learn about the people and stories of the park, and keep up to date with the latest happenings. Join the Conversation!          Preparing for preservation   Preservation Work on Sandburg Home Begins in 2015 Learn more about the ongoing preservation work taking place at the Sandburg Home starting in 2015.
